description: Vaccination will not be mandatory, officials say, and the register will not be made public.
title: Coronavirus: Spain to keep register of those who refuse Covid vaccine
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain to keep register of those who refuse Covid vaccine - BBC News
maintext: He added: "People who are offered a therapy that they refuse for any reason, it will be noted in the register... that there is no error in the system, not to have given this person the possibility of being vaccinated."
